products.description: Refresh your space with their alaina speckled gold roller blind. The cosy neutral with elegant golden threads is splendid and magical. products.title: Choices Grande Stripe Linen Roller Blind
products.description: This beautiful natural looking roller blind is made from pure linen and has a traditional looking striped pattern that is perfect for an organic scheme. Alternating bands of soft sand and cream combine with a slubbed, rustic texture to create a look thats natural, neutral and o this beautiful natural looking roller blind is made from pure linen and has a traditional looking striped pattern that is perfect for an organic scheme.

products.title: Country Meadow, Fresh - Roller Blind
products.description: If you look closely at their new country meadow fresh fabric you come to appreciate the artisan skill that goes into intricately layering the colours. They seem to ebb and flow, this way and that, giving the fabric a life of its own as they do so. Matching to meadow fresh is all about being flexible with the other colours you introduce. A neutral beige is the ideal colour for the new living room carpet, whilst a light mint feature wall would also make for an inspiring finishing touch.

products.title: Woodland, Twilight - Roller Blind
products.description: When you take a closer look at woodland twilight you soon come to appreciate that it has far more to offer than one of this season's must-have colours. Everything about the subtlety of the texture has been designed to add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. The best way to match to twilight is to focus on texture before you think about colour. Rubbing down your wooden floor and lightly staining it will add more character than laying laminate flooring.

products.title: Osborne, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne smoke is a modern reinterpretation of a classically patterned design that takes its inspiration from the beautiful free-flowing forms of natural plant-life. A gentle grey is used to print the design onto the off-white background, giving this version of the osborne a lovely, smoky aesthetic. The smoke works beautifully as a lightener in rooms where darker features dominate, without challenging the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Osborne, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne in natural adds a look of luxury and taste, without feeling lavish or over-the-top. The soft taupe patterning on a bed of light-filtering cream work together to bring together contemporary traditionalism and pretty comfort. The natural will sit comfortably in a number of colour schemes, the most notable being one of turquoises, aquas, and golds, which will suit a modern bedroom or living room in need of a refreshing dcor revival.

products.title: Neo, Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: The neo thunder is a grey-blue, ornately patterned filter blind that is sure to add something a little different to your home. The high quality fabric hangs on an easy-to-use rolling mechanism, so using this blind is as simple you would want it to be. Unite the thunder with creams, greys, and muted blues in an older child's bedroom or playroom for a subtle and fun style; or use in the guest bedroom to give your visitors a warm and eye-catching welcome.

products.title: Neo, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something natural, yet not plain, the neo natural might just be the blind for you. This light-filtering blind combines a subtle beige background with off-white patterning, perfect for adding character without intruding on existing dcor. Craft a calming home office space that will help you concentrate and relax while you work, by combining the natural with other soft neutrals and creams.

products.title: Neo, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Neo's aqua comprises of a speckled turquoise background on which sits an intricate symmetrical patterning, providing contemporary style to any window. And you won't lose all the light when you close it, as this filter blind allows light to penetrate through into your room. Place the aqua in the family bathroom, amongst white tiles and accenting accessories, or use for a cool, relaxing feel in a light taupe bedroom, where you're looking for both function and style, without the fuss.

products.title: Ardwell, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The ardwell in aqua is made from a quality fabric that is functional, lightweight, and adorned with beautifully printed curvaceous plant designs that enliven the senses. The crisp white contrasts stunningly with the weathered beige background, whilst the duck-egg blue is always a calming colour to have in any home. Perfect for complementing rooms with plain walls and floors, the aqua is certainly a work of art all its own.

products.title: Woodland, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: Woodland natural combines a simple and neutral on-trend colour with a unique texture to give an added layer of unexpected depth to your decor. It's these little touches that bring the fabric to life, and make you feel at home as soon as you put your key in the door. If you want to be able to turn on the style in the dining room, why not treat yourself to some slate flooring and a matching thick wooden topped table? These are the sort of rustic meets contemporary touches that woodland natural was made to hang by.

products.title: Ashanti, Olive - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours. The olive adds mellow green stripes to the backdrop of cream, grey, and black to form a cool, contemporary look. The olive is perfect for when you want to add a few dashes of natural green to a room, without dominating it with a pure green, one-colour blind. Why not make a virtue of the green stripes, and use the olive to subtly change the colour scheme of your room? Ashanti, olive - roller blind the ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours.

products.title: Saphira, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and admire saphira natural, you come to appreciate the elegant way in which the colours have combined to create something that is very much greater than the sum of their parts. The clever use of calming greens and soothing blues really does give the fabric a life of its own. We love the idea of working in a powdery sunrise orange so that that you can turn the master bedroom into the space that greets you with a smile when you wake each morning.

products.title: Grosvenor, Nice - Roller Blind
products.description: The grosvenor nice is one of their most modern and stylish blinds. Combining a neutral, light beige background with a beautifully arranged assortment of contemporary sketched plants and flowers, this offering from the grosvenor range is a must-have. The natural feel and imagery of the nice make this ideal as an accompaniment to a hearty, home-cooked meal in the kitchen or dining room. Alternatively, why not use in the lounge so you can appreciate the unique artwork this blind will add to your home as you sit and relax? Grosvenor, nice - roller blind the grosvenor nice is one of their most modern and stylish blinds.

products.title: Tranquil, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The tranquil in aqua is comprised of delicate teal and soft brown florals and leaves, set on a pale taupe-cream backdrop that will provide just enough shade and plenty of privacy, whilst still allowing some of that all-important daylight to trickle in. For a calming influence in your home office, surround the aqua with soft creams and light woods, only accenting occasionally with gentle teals and creamy cappuccinos.

products.title: Tranquil, Fresh - Roller Blind
products.description: A stunningly light combination of summer yellows, baby blues, and dusk greens, the tranquil in fresh is set on a pale cream background that allows the light to filter through and fill the room with a soft, sunny glow. For a quiet elegance in the kitchen or living room, offset the fresh with matching hues and light, unobtrusive woods, so that you can sit back and enjoy the subtle beauty of this blind in peace.
